scripts.start: concurrently -n "server,protoc,grpcwebproxy,client" "nodemon -e js,proto --watch server server/main.js" "nodemon -e proto --watch server/protos scripts/build.js" "grpcwebproxy --server_tls_cert_file=./server.crt --server_tls_key_file=./server.key --backend_addr=localhost:3337 --backend_tls_noverify --server_http_max_read_timeout=1m --server_http_max_write_timeout=1m" "cd client && webpack-dev-server"
